attributes.action: To retract all disability cuts in the budget.
attributes.additional_details: Additional details are around the world look into things deeper people, you will see them or hear about it in the news, internet but mostly friends and family.
attributes.background:
To better the disabled's life is not to axe their money from them. 
Their independence and self pride is taken away let alone their travel expenses the government seem to think they can work which is an absolute disgrace they should be looking to include an extra pay from taxing higher earners.
